title: Just a link too all my champion ideas so I can get more feedback! (Hopefully)
body:

To anyone who acutally read all of this thank you and I hope everyone has the best day ever ^.^!

replies.body:
Hi Sushi,

I strongly suggest you type up the names of your concepts and hyperlink them in this thread, as opposed to pasting the URLs directly.

The title of the thread is also a little busy... Maybe you should remake it?
Mhmmm The problem is I don't know how to do Hyperrlinks >.< But I can remake the title !

> [{quoted}](name=SushiKnight,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7cIYsEJR,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-31T20:52:08.396+0000)
>
> Mhmmm The problem is I don't know how to do Hyperrlinks >.< But I can remake the title !

"Copy" the URL to your clipboard, then type up the name of the concept the link goes to in your thread.  After that, highlight the name and then go to the bottom of the post and find the "Insert a link" button, next to the quotes and strikethrough options.  Click that, then paste the URL into the text field that shows up.  From there, just repeat the process for each concept you have.  :)

Oh here I remade it a bit
And I will "TRY" to do the hyperlink >.< 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/5EqQi9Zo-sushi-champion-archive
Oh and btw I never knew someone actually took a look at this
